original_solution_mapping.L2: So, 20 - 5 = <<20-5=15>>15 dolphins are not yet fully trained.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Therefore, 15 - 10 = <<15-10=5>>5 dolphins will be trained next month.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7040.
    Returns: the number of dolphins that will be trained next month.
    """
    # L1
    total_dolphins = 20 # There are 20 dolphins
    trained_fraction = Fraction(1, 4) # One-fourth of the dolphins are fully trained
    fully_trained_dolphins = total_dolphins * trained_fraction

    # L2
    remaining_dolphins = total_dolphins - fully_trained_dolphins

    # L3
    in_training_fraction = Fraction(2, 3) # Two-third of the remaining dolphins are currently in training
    currently_in_training = remaining_dolphins * in_training_fraction

    # L4
    will_be_trained_next_month = remaining_dolphins - currently_in_training

    # FA
    answer = will_be_trained_next_month
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: So, {total_dolphins} - {fully_trained_dolphins} = <<{total_dolphins}-{fully_trained_dolphins}={remaining_dolphins}>>{remaining_dolphins} dolphins are not yet fully trained.

Therefore, {remaining_dolphins} - {currently_in_training} = <<{remaining_dolphins}-{currently_in_training}={will_be_trained_next_month}>>{will_be_trained_next_month} dolphins will be trained next month.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So, 20 - 5 = <<20-5=15>>15 dolphins are not yet fully trained.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Therefore, 15 - 2/3 = <<15-2/3=43/3>>43/3 dolphins will be trained next month.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'in_training_fraction' (value: 2/3) was used instead of 'currently_in_training' (value: 10).
